edu.cnm.deepdive.celestialbodies.util

Class MathUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cnm.deepdive.celestialbodies.util.MathUtil

  • public class MathUtil
extends Object
    Methods for doing mathematical operations with floats. This class is used by the Celestial Bodies app for necessary calculations for determining right ascension and declination.
    Author:
    Brent Bryan

      • quickModulo

        public static float quickModulo(float x,
                                float y)
        Returns x if x greater than or equal y, or x-y if not. While this utility performs a role similar to a modulo operation, it assumes x greater than or equal to 0 and that x less than 2y.

      • random

        public static float random(float f)
        Returns a random number between 0 and f.
